The three "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "molecular and functional properties," "severe aggregation," and "solution processability." These entities are related to the characteristics or aspects of a polymer that can be influenced or affected by structural modification.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, the only clear "Value of material property" entity is "solution processability." This term refers to a material property that can be affected by structural modification and is related to the ability of a polymer to be processed in a solution. The other entities mentioned, "molecular and functional properties" and "severe aggregation," are more related to the behavior or state of the polymer rather than its specific material properties.
